short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn Japanese word readings in bite-sized pieces with every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock a new Japanese word with every tab you open. Perfect for advanced learners, this extension shows you Japanese words and asks you to write the correct reading for the word. Perfect for bite-sized revision each time you open a new tab.

As a bonus gamification feature, you also gain points (XP) for each word you answer correctly!
